FUNC.NAME: upce1preamble
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the upce1-preamble property which controls the preamble applied to the bar code.

PARAM.NAME: upce1preamble
PARAM.DESC: if none Applies no preamble to the bar code. if systemChar Applies system character preamble to the bar code.if countryAndSystemChars Applies both system and country code preamble to the bar code.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only upce1 labels with the preamble property set to both system and country code preamble:
The following example enables the scanner to read only upce1 labels with the preamble property set to both system and country code preamble:
The following example enables the scanner to read only upce1 labels with the preamble property set to both system and country code preamble:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-upce1" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-upce1preamble" Content="countryAndSystemChars"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports upce1.
